TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PersonalizationDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type PersonalizationDictionary = class interface IDictionary interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封裝基本驗證規則，這些規則指出在 或 範圍中，是否將自訂資料視為可個人化。

span.span: Encapsulates basic validation rules that indicate whether a piece of custom data is considered personalizable in either or scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A例項為集合的包含個人化範圍和值物件的物件。A instance is a collection of objects, which consist of a personalization scope and an object value. 這些項目指派中的索引鍵物件。These entries are assigned a key in the object. 理想的作法是將所有的屬性新增至字典使用方法，不論頁面的範圍。A good practice is to add all properties to the dictionary using the method, regardless of the scope of the page. .NET Framework 會將資訊儲存在適當的方式;例如，共用的資料會儲存當頁面處於範圍。The .NET Framework saves the information in the appropriate way; for example, shared data is saved when the page is in scope. 不過，正在儲存 Web 組件值時，不會儲存共用的屬性，在頁面位於範圍，而中的頁面中已加入控制項範圍。However, shared properties are not saved when a Web Parts value is being saved, the page is in scope, and the control was added with the page in scope.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
Web Parts Personalization Overview

related.span: 逐步解說：以使用者控制項的實作 Web 組件個人化

span.span: Walkthrough: Implementing Web Parts Personalization with a User Control
Web Parts Personalization

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會初始化空的字典。This constructor initializes an empty dictionary. 字典會將索引鍵值，視為不區分大小寫。The dictionary will treat key values as case-insensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會初始化空的字典，根據項目，以儲存在字典中的估計數目。This constructor initializes an empty dictionary based on the estimated number of entries to be stored in the dictionary. 字典會將索引鍵值，視為不區分大小寫。The dictionary will treat key values as case-insensitive.

summary.span: 將個人化項目加入個人化字典。

span.span: Adds personalization entries to the personalization dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您還可以將呼叫這個方法，將狀態物件中的自訂狀態資訊的不同部分，並指定狀態的值相關聯的範圍。You can call this method, place various pieces of custom state information into the state object, and specify the scope associated with the state value. 當控制項處於範圍內，您可以新增與其中一個相關聯的名稱和狀態資訊範圍或範圍。When a control is in scope, you can add name and state information that is associated with either scope or scope. 在 範圍內，您可以新增只能與相關聯的名稱和狀態資訊範圍。In scope, you can add name and state information associated only with scope. 它是良好的做法，不過，若要將所有的屬性加入至字典使用包括具有屬性或範圍，不論頁面的範圍。It is a good practice, however, to add all properties to the dictionary using including properties with or scope, regardless of the scope of the page. .NET Framework 只會儲存在內容時適當的範圍。The .NET Framework only saves the properties with scope when appropriate. 換句話說，共用屬性不會儲存時最初中新增的控制項頁面時，稍後會儲存範圍範圍。In other words, shared properties are not saved when a control that was initially added in scope is later saved while the page is in scope. 在相反的情況下，如果中的頁面加入控制項範圍，以及控制稍後儲存在頁面位於範圍，共用的自訂屬性的值會儲存 （以及自訂使用者範圍的屬性）。In an opposite scenario, if a control was added to the page in scope, and the control is later saved while the page is in scope, custom shared property values are saved (along with custom user-scoped properties). 如需個人化資料的詳細資訊和如何共用和使用者範圍的屬性會受到網頁的個人化範圍，請參閱 < [Web 組件個人化概觀](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))主題。For details on personalization data and how shared and user-scoped properties are affected by the personalization scope of the page, see the [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)) topic. 如同任何集合，這個方法的集合計數遞增一，並在集合上目前作用中的所有列舉值應該即將失效。As with any collection, this method increments the collection count by one and any enumerators currently active on the collection should be invalidated.

summary.span: 移除目前 物件的所有自訂狀態資訊。

span.span: Removes all custom state information from the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會清除目前的所有自訂狀態資訊物件。This method clears all custom state information from the current object. 任何目前作用中，針對集合的列舉程式應該會失效。Any enumerators currently active against the collection should be invalidated. 個人化字典中移除只有特定的個人化項目，請使用方法。To remove only a specific personalization entry in a personalization dictionary, use the method. 請注意，空的個人化字典上呼叫這個方法時，不會引發錯誤。Note that calling this method on an empty personalization dictionary does not raise an error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可搭配物件，表示所識別的自訂個人化資訊`key`參數。This property works with a object representing custom personalization information that is identified by the `key` parameter. 如果沒有任何值，如`key`，`null`會傳回。If there is no value for `key`, `null` is returned. 如果`key`不存在，然後`key`（和其相關聯的值） 加入至字典。If `key` does not already exist, then `key` (and its associated value) are added to the dictionary. 請注意，您可以將 null 值加入字典中，索引子也可用來更新個人化的值。Note that you can add a null value to the dictionary, and the indexer can also be used to update the personalization value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就內部而言，當您移除自訂狀態項目時，個人化字典的計數會減一。Internally, when you remove a custom state entry, the count of the personalization dictionary is decremented by one. 任何目前作用中，根據字典的列舉程式應該會失效。Any enumerators currently active against the dictionary should be invalidated. 如果您嘗試移除不存在的索引鍵，就會不發生任何錯誤。No error occurs if you attempt to remove a nonexistent key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於那些無法公開使用基礎存放區的集合而言，所預期的實作會傳回目前的執行個體。For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance. 請注意，目前的執行個體的指標可能無法完全包裝其他集合; 的集合這些集合應該傳回基礎集合屬性。Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's property.

summary.span: 實作 類別的 方法。

span.span: Implements the method for the class.

returns.span: 要透過個人化字典中項目列舉之 的執行個體。

span.span: An instance of to enumerate through the items in a personalization dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會直接呼叫類別自己方法。The method directly calls the class's own method.
